topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5539de8e6368727646890200#post_5539de8e6368727646890200
[bq="HJSDGCE"]"@EHAN":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5539ddc56368727951cd0800#post_5539ddc56368727951cd0800
Don't get it.[/bq]
If the post number ends with the last 2 digits being the same, it's called a double (or "dubs")

If the last 3 digits are identical, they're triples ("trips")

And etc.

And ArcticEight posted a thing about having his posts number being "777"
